hero.header: Nature's Artistry, Cultivated for Your Home
hero.paragraph: Fronda marries nature and art—each potted plant is a living masterpiece that transforms your space into a vibrant gallery of natural beauty.

offerings.paragraph: Explore our in-season selection—fresh, vibrant plants at their peak, ready to brighten your home.

about_us.paragraph1: Fronda's journey began with Elena, a woman whose past was as wild and unpredictable as the plants she now nurtures. Once a mercenary, Elena roamed across war-torn landscapes, navigating danger and uncertainty.
about_us.paragraph2: In the midst of conflict, it was the resilience of nature—an unexpected sprout through cracked pavement or a flower blossoming in the most unlikely places—that gave her peace. After years of service, Elena left the battlefield behind, seeking solace in the quiet strength of plants.
about_us.paragraph3: What started as a personal escape from her chaotic life grew into a deep passion, and Fronda was born—a place where every plant tells a story of survival, beauty, and transformation. Through Fronda, Elena brings you a piece of that same peace and resilience, offering plants that don't just fill your home—they tell stories of hope and renewal.

why_us.paragraph: Fronda's plants do more than decorate, they improve your well-being.
We don't just sell plants; we cultivate relationships. Our plants are hand-selected from small, sustainable farms that share our commitment to quality.

Fronda's plants thrive in any home. Whether it's a serene, low-maintenance succulent or a striking statement piece, our collection fits seamlessly into your life, no matter the size or style of your space.

reviews.paragraph: Our plants do more than brighten your space—they create lasting impressions. See how Fronda's greenery has transformed homes, lifted spirits, and become a part of our customers' everyday lives. Let their stories inspire your next plant addition.

reviewsList.name: Elise W.
reviewsList.content: Got the Celestial Whisper for a friend going through a tough time. She loved the story behind it and told me it made her feel more grounded. It's more than a plant—it's a little piece of peace.

reviewsList.name: Jason R.
reviewsList.content: I've never had much of a green thumb, but my Green Cascade is still going strong after two months. Fronda’s care guide was super easy to follow, and I swear my living room feels fresher and calmer. Will definitely be ordering again!

reviewsList.name: Maya L.
reviewsList.content: I ordered a Tranquil Veil and it completely changed the vibe of my apartment. The plant arrived healthy, beautifully packaged, and even came with a little note about its care. It feels like Fronda puts real love into what they do.
